product_name: REI Sport Jacket - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: Designed for cold-weather runs, the women's REI Sport Jacket in plus sizes uses soft, moisture-wicking fabric to prevent chills and keep you comfortable when you're working hard. Soft polyester/spandex fabric offers 4-way stretch for comfort on the go; it also wicks moisture to keep you drier. Mesh panel in rear yoke circulates air to keep you comfortable when the pace picks up. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Flatseam construction prevents chafing. Thumbhole cuffs allow sleeves to extend for greater for warmth and coverage. Zippered hand pockets secure essentials; one has a cord port. Reflective trim increases visibility in low light. Princess seams on front and back of jacket offer a flattering, feminine look. The REI Sport Jacket for women in plus sizes offers an active fit that allows for a full range of motion.
short_description: Designed for cold-weather runs, the women's REI Sport Jacket in plus sizes uses soft, moisture-wicking fabric to prevent chills and keep you comfortable when you're working hard.
